text: [Music]
foreign
is the largest Logistics supplier in the
Benelux we employ over 35 000 people we
have 34 sorting centers in the
Netherlands and Benelux we've existed
for over 220 years and we've
transitioned from forces to trains and
from trains to trucks so even at 2012 we
decided to go all in on cloud and we
closed our last data centers and started
our strategic partnership with AWS
Logistics is a very seasonal business in
the middle of the day we process
millions of events while at night we
process hardly any events at all and the
same goes on a weekly basis and AWS
serverless is a perfect match to that
seasonality because it elastically
skills with the volume that we process
so our operational costs are
automatically low when the amount is low
and it automatically skills without
human Intervention when the amount is
high Personnel delivers an average of 1
0.1 million Parcels per day and each of
those Parcels in each of those
deliveries generate many software events
so our Central event broker currently
processes well over 10 million events
per day and over 200 million events per
month we Peak at about 320 events per
second and we expect those numbers to
significantly grow in the next few
months as the usage of our Central event
broker continues to grow
at the core of our Central integration
platform City vanbridge eventbridge can
easily scale to the volumes that we need
and it allows us to very easily add new
consumers and add new subscriptions in
our landscape by embracing the cloud and
the services that AWS has to offer we've
been able to increase Innovation and
reduce time to Market allowing us to be
our customers favorite delivery
